title: Ticket #1496: Enabling batch processing in condor_advertise
description:
Request for feature:

condor_advertise reads one classad file per call. In each invocation, it reads the config file etc.

In case of calling condor_advertise on a large number of classad files (tens of thousands or more), it would be helpful to have it accept the following:

  1. Either have it accept an array of files, such that it can batch process them, or
  2. it could accept a large file with multiple "machine" classads, or
  3. it could accept input from stdin.
remarks:
2010-Jul-09 10:10:27 by matt:
Probably not (1) since you'd never be able to get that many files on the command line.

2010-Sep-02 16:34:51 by matt:
For anyone just reading the ticket, the solution was (2) with empty lines separating the classads.
